valueProps.text: Capture every vital detail from emails, Slack, and more directly into your Trello Inbox.
Automate tasks and workflows with Trello.
Power up your teams by linking their favorite tools with Trello plugins.
Trello helps marketing teams succeed in launching new products, campaigns, or creating content.

pains: Need to organize tasks and projects efficiently
proof: Trello is part of Atlassian, a well-known software company
Trello offers a free plan for individuals or small teams

facts.text: Trello offers a free plan for individuals or small teams.
facts.evidence: Free plan For individuals or small teams looking to keep work organized.

facts.text: Trello provides a visual layout for task management.
facts.evidence: Track progress of tasks in one convenient place with a visual layout.

facts.text: Trello Inbox captures details from emails and Slack.
facts.evidence: Capture every vital detail from emails, Slack, and more directly into your Trello Inbox.

facts.text: Trello allows calendar syncing for productivity.
facts.evidence: Sync your calendar and allocate focused time slots to boost productivity.
Automate tasks and workflows with Trello.

facts.text: Trello offers plugins to link favorite tools.
facts.evidence: Power up your teams by linking their favorite tools with Trello plugins.

facts.text: Trello provides templates from industry leaders.
facts.evidence: Give your team a blueprint for success with easy-to-use templates from industry leaders.
Find the apps your team is already using or discover new ways to get work done in Trello.

facts.text: Trello is suitable for teams of any size.
facts.evidence: Whether you’re a team of 2 or 2,000, Trello’s flexible pricing model means you only pay for what you need.

facts.text: Trello helps marketing teams with product launches and campaigns.
facts.evidence: Whether launching a new product, campaign, or creating content, Trello helps marketing teams succeed.
Keep your remote team connected and motivated, no matter where they’re located around the world.
